name: Derf Party Test
description:
*** still in early prototyping! not finished! ****

In this shooter, gameplay will be divided into rounds containing multiple objective based mingames. Each round will have different base parameters and rules to dictate how the game is played. Each individual minigame will have its own set of parameters on top of the round parameters that are different for each minigame.

The game is still under development, but it will improve with time! Try out the game and see what you think. If you like it, tell us what you like about it! If you have any questions, problems, or suggestions, let us know in the comments or on our Discord at https://discord.gg/CTapwP7T9D! We would love to hear your feedback on the game so we can make it even better!

     -      -     -     Controls:     -     -     -

The game is played with controllers with up to 4 players.

To join, press any button.

Movement is with the left stick.

Auto-shoot with the right stick in the direction you point.

     -     -     -      Contact:     -     -     -

If you have any feedback, problems, or suggestions, let us know!

You can leave your feedback in the comments or join the discord at https://discord.gg/CTapwP7T9D where you can leave feedback, discuss the game, get notifications on the latest builds and news, or even share your favourite rock images!
